description:
Ryouun and Sonshin continue to fight against Hakuanshi`s generals.  Sonshin`s spiritual energy is beginning to run out, and it won`t be long before he`s completely dry.  But even after he temporarily repels this foe, he still has to deal with a reckless and angry Shuuyu, who blunders straight into a trap...
Source: crunchyroll
